circumstances: The aircraft was performing a paratroopers/skydiving mission in the region of Bandung, taking part to a military  program with members of the Special Forces on board. While approaching runway 29 with 20 knots crosswind, the aircraft went out of control and crashed onto a hangar, bursting into flames. All 24 occupants were killed, among them 17 paratroopers, one instructor and 6 crew members.
